member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.EnableDebugLog
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether detailed dlna server logs are sent to the console/log. If the setting "DlnaServer": "Debug" must be set in logging.default.json for this property to work.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.DefaultUserId
member.summary: Gets or sets the default user account that the dlna server uses.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.AliveMessageIntervalSeconds
member.summary: Gets or sets the frequency at which SSDP alive notifications are transmitted.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.DlnaServerName
member.summary: Gets or sets a custom name for the Dlna Server.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.Configuration
member.summary: Gets the SSDP Configuration settings.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.EnableSsdpTracing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether detailed SSDP logs are sent to the console/log. "Emby.Dlna": "Debug" must be set in logging.default.json for this property to have any effect.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.SsdpTracingFilter
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether an IP address is to be used to filter the detailed ssdp logs that are being sent to the console/log. If the setting "Emby.Dlna": "Debug" must be set in logging.default.json for this property to work.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.UdpPortRange
member.summary: Gets or sets the range of UDP ports to use in communications as well as 1900.

member.name: P:Jellyfin.Plugin.DlnaServer.Configuration.DlnaServerConfiguration.UdpSendCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times SSDP UDP messages are sent.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating the default icon width.
